title: Remove relationship intent badge/text from Circle Members list

requirements.text: In the Circle page’s Members tab, stop displaying each member’s relationship intent (romantic/friendship/both) in the members list UI.

quotes: In the circles page, under Members, stop displaying circles intent
yes, the relationship intent (romantic/friendship) badge/text that appear next to each member

acceptanceCriteria: On /authenticated/circle under the Members tab, member rows no longer show any relationship intent text (e.g., "Friendship", "Romantic", or "Both").
Gender (and any other existing member metadata like name/age and pulse badge) continues to render as before.
The frontend TypeScript build passes without unused imports/types related to relationship intent in the members list component.

constraints: Do not edit any frontend files under immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the user profile data model or backend APIs for relationship intent.
Do not change onboarding/profile setup behavior; this change is limited to the Circle Members list display.
